title: Flying to the UK? A pre-departure COVID test will soon be required, regardless of vaccination status
content:
1. Flying to the UK? A pre-departure COVID test will soon be required, regardless of vaccination status  USA TODAY
  2. Coronavirus: UK tightens travel rules amid Omicron spread  BBC News
  3. Sajid Javid announces pre-departure Covid tests for travellers to England  The Independent
  4. Britain tightens testing for inbound travellers, adds Nigeria to red list  Reuters UK
  5. Omicron variant sparks tightening of travel restrictions in U.K.  KTLA
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: イギリスへのフライトについて ワクチン接種の有無にかかわらず、出国前のCOVID検査が間もなく必要になります。
